name: Calyx Managed Services
tag_list: workspace, voice, data, unified-communications-applications, connectivity, security, infrastructure-management, communications, wan-carrier-services
overview:
Calyx is the leading independent provider of Managed ICT Services in the UK & Ireland supporting thousands of businesses with our comprehensive range of technology skills and unparalleled expertise in managed IT services.

Calyx is the first-choice, trusted partner for supporting transformation in medium-sized, agile enterprises - streamlining operations, increasing innovation and reducing costs by providing best practice flexible cloud-based managed ICT services that evolve with the business. Calyx is dedicated to this market and is transforming itself, understanding at first hand the challenges that these business face in evolving successfully.

The UK’s most proactive, mid-size businesses choose to work with Calyx because the company sees its role as that of a trusted guide to help companies on their own journey of transformation. Calyx helps its customers achieve their ambitions by understanding their strategy and building the appropriate IT infrastructure to support that aim.

The transformation journeys that Calyx takes with its customers increasingly involve secure cloud-based managed ICT services that integrate data, voice and mobile. We offer a flexible extension to your IT Services and ICT strategy by providing specialist design, build, install and support capabilities across the entire range of ICT; Workspace, Voice, Data, Unified Communications Applications, Connectivity, Security, Infrastructure Management, Communications and WAN Carrier Services.

milestones.description: Better Capital acquires Calyx debts, calls in the administrators.
milestones.source_description: Better Capital acquires Calyx debts, calls in the administrators
